name: A Simple Game (ScoobyDrewAu)
description:
Finished a short "Create your first 3D game" course with Zenva.

 Added a few  extra levels. Will add some more menu options soon.  

Controls are:

- arrow keys for movement, 

- left alt key for attack, 

- space bar for jump 

- and esc for menu.

Goal is to collect all the coins and head back to the green safe zone to enter the next level
